backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles, rewards tasks, submissions, points, and withdrawals with admin/user authorization. Provides CRUD-like operations for tasks and profile handling with access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a specific landing page text-change feature to its files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining light/dark theme variables and applying base layout tokens.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with PWA metadata, icons, and root mount point for the React app.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app name, colors, icons, and display behavior for installation.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing simple cache-first offline support with versioned cache handling.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app controlling authentication flow, view routing, and profile setup gating.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: UI card displaying an access denied message for unauthorized users.
frontend/src/components/AdminGuard.tsx: Wrapper component that checks user role and renders admin content or an access denied screen.
frontend/src/components/AdminScreen.tsx: Admin dashboard for creating tasks and reviewing submissions and withdrawal requests.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Shared layout component providing navbar, main content container, and footer across views.
frontend/src/components/LandingScreen.ts: Landing page component showing app intro, feature highlights, and login button using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity authentication state and query cache resets.
frontend/src/components/NavBar.tsx: Responsive navigation bar showing views based on auth state and role, with mobile menu and login button.
frontend/src/components/PointsBalanceCar: Card displaying the user's points balance with loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Dialog prompting new users for their name and saving it via a profile mutation.
frontend/src/components/TasksScreen.tsx: Screen listing tasks, showing submission statuses, and allowing users to submit task completions.
frontend/src/components/WalletScreen.tsx: Wallet view for requesting withdrawals and viewing request history with balance validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and managing the backend actor based on identity and invalidating related queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for admin actions like creating tasks, reviewing submissions, and handling withdrawal requests, mostly using placeholder queries where backend methods are missing.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context and provider for auth state, login flow, and identity persistence using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useRewardsQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profiles, roles, tasks, submissions, point balance, and withdrawal requests using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom theme variables for light and dark modes, plus global layout and mobile optimizations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and sessionStorage-backed values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, layout, animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Metadata describing the projectâ€™s state, features, versions, and notes.
